dct_title_s: Orographical and hydrographical map of Japan (Dai-Nippon) on a scale of 1:2,930,000
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading.; Also includes bargraph measured in Ri.; "Geograph. Anst. v. Wagner & Debes, Leipzig"--Lower left margin.; "London, Hodder and Stoughton, 27 Paternoster Row"--Lower margin.; Includes insets: Chishima (Kuriles) -- Riukiu -- Ogasawara-shima or Muninto? (Bonin Islds.).; One of two maps probably included in a UK edition (either 1883 or 1888) of: Japan: Travels and Researches, Undertaken at the Cost of the Prussian Government by J.J. Rein, Professor of Geography in Marburg, Translated from the German with Twenty Illustrations and Two Maps--unlinked web page of George C. Baxley, stamp and book dealer, Alamogordo, NM.
